original_text: These are those which were numbered of the children of Israel by the house of their fathers: all those that were numbered of the camps throughout their hosts were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty.
korean_text: 이상은 이스라엘 자손이 그들의 조상의 가문을 따라 계수된 자니 모든 진영의 군인 곧 계수된 자의 총계는 육십만 삼천오백오십 명이며

sentences.original_text: These are those which were numbered of the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이들은 이스라엘 자손 중에서 계수된 자들입니다

sentences.original_text: by the house of their fathers:
all those that were numbered of the camps
